website_summaries.verdict: A simple yet highly effective blend of baking soda, fragrance, and anti-clumping agents. As easy on the pocket as it is on the nose.
pros: Baking soda continuously absorbs odors while the moisture activated fragrance kicks in every time cats use the litter box
Anti-clumping technology keeps powder from sticking to the bottom of the box
cons: Fine powder is more likely to be tracked out of the box

customer_reviews.title: I mean, you just need to get this, ...
customer_reviews.text: I mean, you just need to get this, or else you're going to really resent your cat for it needing a litter box, and then you'll need to get therapy together to work through your resentment. It's just cheaper to get this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B.

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes -even with the best litter-  you need more
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I hate scented litter. However. Sometimes you need more. Like when the pan is very low and you're not doing a full replacement or backfill immediately. Or guests. Or dueling dominance assertion pissing on the interior sides of the lid. I don't use this often but I keep it one hand. Note: after opening, I transfer this to a glass jar w/ a tight lid.
customer_reviews.author: wellson

customer_reviews.title: Cat Box Help in a Box
customer_reviews.text: It's Arm & Hammer Odor Eliminator. Too bad it doesn't come in an Extra Large Size for Politics. Works Great. I was disappointed in the company that shipped them and that I purchased from, they were Very Late Shipping the Product. But the Product is very Helpful in Eliminating the Cat Box Odor Problems. Especially when yo have Three Cats. Will buy again, not from the company that I made the Original Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert TonkavichTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT LIKE THE SCENT. VERY OVERPOWERING
customer_reviews.text: Scent is very overpowering and I did not like the scent. I opened the container and used it a little amount and got rid of the rest. The value was good for the amount you get. Cannot attest to the odor elimination because the product's scent was overpowering everything. I switched to just plain baking soda. The production description and box needs to do a better job of stating that this is a SCENTED product...I originally thought this was a scentless deodorizer.
customer_reviews.author: Thegelatoking

customer_reviews.title: Works Pretty Well
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works pretty well. I've also used NonScents to compare. I am super sensitive to certain smells and though this product does a good job of cutting down the odor, it carries a sweet smell itself. I personally would prefer that it be odorless so there's no possibility of the product smell mingling with the litter box odor.
customer_reviews.author: Lys

customer_reviews.title: I've used this for years
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that you may think is non-essential. However, I've had cats for years and this really refreshes the cat litter. I clean the litter every single day, sometimes more than once a day, especially when I had two cats. This has the benefits of baking powder (which absorbs odors) plus a fresh scent. I know I like it and the cats certainly seem to.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not very long lasting
customer_reviews.text: The powder literally looks like baking soda. The scent it the typical perfumey scent associated with cat litter. I bought to supplement the odor control of my box. I have been sprinkling a liberal amount and then making sure I sort of incorporate it into the clean litter. Works immediately but is gone within a few days. Not great if you want to just add it once every 1-2 weeks. Also once you open the box, there is a sticky blob on the tab to help "reseal". It's pretty much useless after a couple times so you have to be really careful where you put it so it doesn't spill. Don't think I'll repurchase after I finish my boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Helloisitme

customer_reviews.title: Great scent.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. It has a nice scent and I sprinkle a little on top of the litter every day I scoop and it the odor is gone. I have 3 large litter boxes and I think this is the best litter deodorizer I have used. However, do not fill the bottom of the box like the instructions say. It is too powerful and cats will not use it. After you scoop, just blend a little on the top. That is all you need. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ratlady47

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all (and I scoop all the time) and gave me a headache
customer_reviews.text: I put this in clean litter and mixed it around and then would add some after scooping each time but it didn't help the odor and in fact the whole smell of the room was perfumed litter box smell and gave me a massive headache. So I am not using it and just emptied litter box and added regular baking soda and that seems to work much better.
customer_reviews.author: C.  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Well, of course, I use it to try to eliminate the litter box odor. It works pretty well -- certainly smells better than the alternative. I have 5 cats and 10 boxes indoors and outdoors in their small enclosed back yard. I use a good litter that helps with offensive smells, and this product adds more odor blocking. I've actually had people say they would not have known I had cats since there is no "cat box" smell. Thank you to the folks who made this stuff. Judy Starkey
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: While the product itself seems to be good, I was shocked at how small the boxes were. Not much for your money. I'm wondering if plain baking soda might work just as well?
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Glorified baking soda.
customer_reviews.text: Was fooled by the name. In my experience it compromised the clumping ability of the litter and made it smell worse. Regular baking soda, especially at Costco was less the the price of one of these boxes. No substitute for refreshing litter box with fresh litter weekly and doing a complete change every other week. And of course cleaning after your cat/s.
customer_reviews.author: Figaro Kaiju

customer_reviews.title: Removed Car Smell!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this because water got into my car interior after a storm and it smelled SO BAD I needed a remedy and I needed it QUICK. This worked wonderful!! I poured this powder all over the car seat and it soaked up the moisture while also removing the foul smell. I applied more later on and it gave off a nice lavender-clean clothes like smell. Highly recommend for strong foul smells.
customer_reviews.author: rsa1111

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleasant Aroma
customer_reviews.text: All Arm & Hammer products deserve five stars. I have two indoor cats and two litter boxes. After filtering/cleaning the litter, I sprinkle some of Arm & Hammer's Litter Deodorizer on top of the litter. Animals have a very sensitive sense of smell, so it is necessary to keep the litter clean with a pleasant aroma. The best product for this is made by Arm & Hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Like the scent, but cost is a little high for the size and the company.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I love this product and scent is the greatest, the only problem is the cost. It surely, a specially for this company(which is not that huge), compare to other ones, should not be that high. Hope the company which sold this product, consider sometimes specials and we would reorder it sometimes again. Scent stays in the litter box and near box for sometimes and relatively kills bad orders for sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Energy

customer_reviews.title: Cat litter deodorizer refreshes litter
customer_reviews.text: This cat litter deodorizer works great. I lightly sprinkle the top of the litter to give a 'fresh smell'. I use when the litter is about a week in the box and needs refreshing. My cats are OK with this deodorizer as well - which as we all know - if the cat does not like it and will not use the box that can be a problem. Good litter refresher!
customer_reviews.author: santoval3

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This helped so much! It definitely has a very strong smell but I'd rather have the strong smell of this rather than the odors from my cats using the bathroom.. plus the strong smell doesn't last that long & it helps cover the odors very well! I highly recommend using this product, I just ran out and I can tell a huge difference without it.
customer_reviews.author: Justina Black

customer_reviews.title: Keeps down litterbox odors
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff for years, and it really works to keep down litterbox odors and keep things smelling fresh. It's pretty long lasting and worth it. If you've got a cat, I'd recommend it along with the Arm & Hammer Slide litter, that is very easy to change and doesn't get stuck to the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kat T.

customer_reviews.title: A must-have
customer_reviews.text: I have a multiple cat household with several litter boxes. This makes the litter box bearable. It absorbs and masks litter box odor better than any other similar product I've used. My cats also don't seem to mind it, and if you have cats, you know how picky they can be about things.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Freshens the Room
customer_reviews.text: We sprinkle this on our throw rugs before we vacuum. It is a really nice fresh scent that just is subtle enough to notice in a room, but not overpowering. This won't mask pet smells, so we clean regularly to avoid that, but it just helps attack cleaning from all angles and adds a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Total Gamechanger!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME! Use non-clumping litter (cheaper and allows you to pitch it more frequently which keeps things fresher), and wipe out your box weekly. Put a light layer of this stuff on the bottom, and you've got a smell-free home. Occasionally I'll sprinkle some on top between cleanings if things get smelly, but this has made a big difference in the smell of our house. Cats don't seem to notice anything. Everybody's happy! P.S. - I've also used regular baking soda when we run out of this - this is worth the purchase because works even better.
customer_reviews.author: IntuitiveBoss

customer_reviews.title: It works. The smell is actually nice
customer_reviews.text: It works. Even their branded litter box stuff can't kill all odors. You really need this. I read others disliking the smell but to me it's Ok, actually pretty good. Just put it at the bottom of the box and cover it with litter and will keep the box odorless.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Roberto Magana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Smell
customer_reviews.text: This product is soooooo good, i use a little bit in the litter after a few days and cant tell you have stinky litter. I also sprinkled some on the carpet and when i vacuumed the room smelled great. Don't need to use alot. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Asiris

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky poops
customer_reviews.text: I have two adult cats and sometimes it gets very stinky in the box even after I clean it on a daily basis. I been using these for a while and it helps a lot. I don’t smell them stinky poops anymore. Definitely recommend for multi cat homes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sutcu

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Scent
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very nice scent that helps to eliminate litter box odors. I sprinkle a little on the litter every day right after scooping out the boxes. It needs to be mixed in with the litter rather than just left on the surface. It really helps cut down on the litter box odors.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with litter robot waste compartment
customer_reviews.text: There is no magical product that will completely get rid of the infamous cat poop odor, but this is as close as it gets. I use it in the hidden compartment of my litter robot and it delays changing the bag by about a day (my nose is a much better sensor than the waste bin fill sensor).
customer_reviews.author: mother of pearl

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the cat box fresh
customer_reviews.text: Has your cat ever dropped an absolute unit of a poo and it stunk up the entire place? This stuff fixes that right up. It is easy to use and has a light, fresh scent. I use it every time I clean the box just to keep things in check.
customer_reviews.author: Yuliana

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats, and sometimes their litter box makes my eyes water. It can be rough, even with frequent cleanings. This stuff is a tremendous help; I use a little when I put the litter in, and I'll refresh after about two days (we change the litter about every four days).
customer_reviews.author: Jared Z. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and I have used it for years. It does an adequate job. Then I discovered Arm and Hammer’s super litter deodorizer. The super deodorizer is a superior product and will be buying it from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Search Alot

customer_reviews.title: A GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: Not all deodorizers are created equally...this does its job. I have 2 cats..albeit , I do my ' due diligence ' ...its scent is pleasent and clean...you need not over use...have indoor cats...this is your product
customer_reviews.author: clothesmaven

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working My cat wasn’t a fan at first, he kept smelling the box like what the hell is this smell and where did my poops go?! But he got over it Litter box def seems less stinky in general
customer_reviews.author: Mel Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Litter Genie XL that I use to dispose of my litter. I put some of this in the bag each time I scoop litter into the bag. It works great in helping to control odors until it is time to take the bag to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: It works but...
customer_reviews.text: It works with locking down the smell from wafting out - however the perfume smell reminds me of moist diapers. It's not terrible but enough so that next time I will just use plain baking soda alone.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box deodorizer!
customer_reviews.text: My new cat is kinda stinky. We love him but boy oh boy. We changed his diet & we use this product and Voila, we no longer have to evacuate! I’m being silly but you get the point. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A Ortolano

customer_reviews.title: Good product for odor control.
customer_reviews.text: This prodauct really cuts down on odor. I liked another brand better but they took it off the market. We have 12 cats and this really helps to keep it from smelling. Always put some litter on top, just so they don.t get it airborne.
customer_reviews.author: Catl8dy

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to decrease litter odor
customer_reviews.text: Liked that I could order two boxes at the same time. I use this product in my cat's litter box. I put it in first then the litter. It really helps to the odor under control.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that comes into my home says they cannot smell a cat in here and I think it's because of this deodorizer. It really hides the bad scents . Item arrived quickly and the contents were not damaged
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: great odor control!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years. Does a great job keeping the litter box fresh. Cats don't object to the scent, and everyone comments that they never would know I have litterboxes in my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Michele C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend can not stand cats because of the litter box smelling. Got this on recommendation from a friend and asked him how he liked it. He told me it's good you should even write a review saying "boyfriend hates cats, can't smell them now hahahah".
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dearmin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Arm and Hammer Cat Litter Deodorizer really helps with lessening the smell of cat litter so much! We use this product all of the time and are very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pierotti

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works. I’ve tried many another products with no success (my two cats share a litter box), but this gets rid of the odor. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Chung

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper in the store - but it’s a great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this for cat litter and refreshing it for odor control but don’t get it here - you will find this much cheaper in the stores (as I found out unfortunately after I already bought them online)
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Really does cut down on litter box odor.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this and it does cut down on odor. It's a pleasant smell and the kittens don't seem to mind it either. It can go fast, depending on how many times you clean your litter box.
customer_reviews.author: K A Shaw

customer_reviews.title: I pair it with the arm & hammer double duty litter and the two together works better than anything I've used in the past
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats, so it can get really smelly in my small apartment. This stuff is heaven sent. I pair it with the arm & hammer double duty litter and the two together works better than anything I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Odor Destroyer
customer_reviews.text: Use it in the bottom of the litter box when we change the litter and clean the box.. Have two cats and it controls the odor pretty well. Can also sprinkle it in between changes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really does control odor!
customer_reviews.text: If you aren't using an odor controlling product, and you still deal with stinky litter, you need to try the A&H litter deodorizing powder! It allows me to keep the litter odor free for a few extra days. This saves tons of money and is better for the cats!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Kitty doesn’t mind
customer_reviews.text: I have two litter robots and I sprinkle a little in the bag when I put a new one in. It seems to have made a big difference in the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: No scent to it but really removes the litter smell. I also think it helps with the clumping. I use it generously because while I love my two cats I cannot live with the smell! Get it it works!
customer_reviews.author: Ghina Yamout

customer_reviews.title: have used this product for many years
customer_reviews.text: I had my kittens in a cage near my rea door, my grandson came for a visit and the first thing he said oh kittens and they don't stink. Thank you Arm and Hammer
customer_reviews.author: Norma S Wimberley

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: With four cats 🐱 it’s essential to control the litter box odor and this does it! Every time I add litter I add Arm & Hammer and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Drake Compton

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail!
customer_reviews.text: This powder works wonders! I have 2 cats so the litter box is constantly smelly (I'm extremely sensitive to odors) this isnt overpowering or too scentful, covers odors well
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for my two cats
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended it to me, she said will lasts two weeks, but I don’t see that I’ve two cats, I change their litter every week. I thought this will held up to two weeks like my friend said, nooo it doesn’t make any changes
customer_reviews.author: Lyeah

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than standard size
customer_reviews.text: These are not the standard size you would find at the grocery store or pet supply. They are smaller. The pictures are misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Litter Box Companion
customer_reviews.text: My litter box must have this deodorizer! It is the "secret" of why no one can smell my litter box. I use it every time I scoop. Fantastic product. A must have for all cat owners!! =^^=
customer_reviews.author: stillwaters

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: You need this. For real. You need this. I can go twice as long without changing litter box now. I don't, but I could because there is so much less scent. I pour half the litter, a generous layer of this stuff then the rest of the litter and I don't smell a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this for years. I have tried the crystals too but I definitely prefer this. It does have a dust factor but as far as masking smell it is the best I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: If you have cats, you need this.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing and makes the cat box undetectable. I honestly wouldn't know that cats lived in the house by the smell of it!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It does cost a bit more this way than when purchased in the store but I didn’t have to go to the store so it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great but dusty
customer_reviews.text: Great product to control litter box odor but it creates additional dust in the box. As far as controlling both odor and dust, I prefer Fresh Step Crystals. Great product but a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Great for my cat.
customer_reviews.text: As always, I use this for my cat's litter box after cleaning it. Removes the odor quickly and lasts for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this so far. The litter box is a lot less potent now. It isn't so obvious when my cat just finished pooping. And the scent of it is nice as well. Glad it came with 2 containers so I won't run out of it too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient
customer_reviews.text: You don't have to use a lot of this in order to be effective at odor prevention. Cats are undeterred, too.
customer_reviews.author: Yard Bird

customer_reviews.title: What a difference
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I ever lived without this. First of all it is baking soda which is a great odor eliminator but it smells lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Gael King

customer_reviews.title: Took care of that cat box smell
customer_reviews.text: Even with a brand new clean box we were getting that "cat box" smell. Using this regularly has eliminated it. Read the directions - you should start out with this mixed into a new batch of litter.
customer_reviews.author: Ed U. Kaytor

customer_reviews.title: It ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: This product works well when u first clean the litter but after awhile it leaves to much dust. The perfume smell is a little strong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: After I clean my litter box I put this down in the litter box. It smells great and keeps odors down.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Reed

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for cat life
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I have 2 cats and can’t live without it. Bonus is that it also helps stop pee from sticking to the bottom of the litter pan too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Tillson

customer_reviews.title: Very small packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to double check size. I expected these to be the same size I normally buy in the store for less...
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Our first cat lived for 17 years. We used this most of her life and are using it now for the “two boys” we adopted. We love it. And the scent from the powder is not overpowering. It works to cover their odors.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fry

customer_reviews.title: Comes in package of two
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily for my 2 cats, have used it for years, started using it via amazon, better priced & convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Usually buy this deodorizer from Walmart but I figured why not order from amazon it may be cheaper? That it was! It had a strong smell that was unbearable for me and my animals. Save your time and purchase elsewhere. My cats did not appreciate this junk!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Clean, not overpowering scent.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only litter deodorant I use because it doesn’t have a strong scent, yet it works.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I remember sitting in my living room and the odor from the litter box would always linger no matter how much I cleaned, lit candles or sprayed. This deodorizer completely suppresses the smell. A worthy buy
customer_reviews.author: J. Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent.  Less is better.
customer_reviews.text: A little goes along way. Works better than plain baking soda and controls odor for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great odor eliminator
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It prevents litter box odors better than anything else I have found
customer_reviews.author: ann dawson

customer_reviews.title: CATS AND I LIKE!
customer_reviews.text: I like this. So do my cats. But I’ve changed litter, boxes, and disposal system. Going from here.
customer_reviews.author: Robin H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a cat iter ox must have item-Cat Litter Deodorizer
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely buy this many times more in the future. Everything arrived on time and as depicted on line. I am very happy with my purchases of this product
customer_reviews.author: CinMinGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very short life
customer_reviews.text: It worked for the time it was on top of the litter in the box and then it was done.
customer_reviews.author: BossLady15

customer_reviews.title: Works to eliminate cat box odors.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for many years for my cat boxes. It's a really good product. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Momma P

customer_reviews.title: Great Odor Guard
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Makes the litter box smell great as if it wasn't even there.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Ice

customer_reviews.title: Helps neutralize odors quite well.
customer_reviews.text: Helps neutralize odors, but it's a bit too floral smelling, especially at first. Works best if you change out litter regularly instead of just trying to use this to disguise a stinky litter box. 😜
customer_reviews.author: Anomalee

customer_reviews.title: Keeps odors to a minimum level.
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time. Has a pleasant scent that isn’t too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the s***, pun intended
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like magic. It keeps orders at bay without and overwhelming, artificial smell when used as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Makes a real difference and helps to keep my apartment smelling nice instead of litter.
customer_reviews.author: John Porter

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates odor
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for along time, love arm and hammer products!
customer_reviews.author: P Wray

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Smells really nice & very helpful containing odor of litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deodorizer for cat boxes.
customer_reviews.text: I've used for years in the litter box. Helps a great deal with both odors and litter substance.
customer_reviews.author: rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It works perfectly and my cat doesn't mind it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works for the smell, what can i say
customer_reviews.text: It does what is intended for it. Ill buy again when I need it
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Safe to use and pleasant smelling.
customer_reviews.text: This product is always great for odor elimination in the cat box.
customer_reviews.author: S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand for my 2 cats for many years. always works!
customer_reviews.author: Nino

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and helps with litter odor!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended for stinky litter pan! Works great and cat doesn’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. McNulty

customer_reviews.title: A must
customer_reviews.text: This is a must if you have multi cats. It really does get rid of odors.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Farooqui

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: It last for a bit but not as long as I thought it will be .
customer_reviews.author: Khrystyna

customer_reviews.title: It works very very well.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the cat litter box smelling real fresh all the time.. I would recommend the family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar B

customer_reviews.title: Arm & Hammer Cat Litter Deodorizer with Activated Baking Soda 20 oz (Pack of 2)
customer_reviews.text: Great cat litter deodorizer. Once you have scooped out the #2 business, the deodorizer does freshen up the litter box. The cats are happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Queen

customer_reviews.title: Very good product! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I really recommend this product to use whenever on your kitty litter. Works really well to get rid of those unwanted smells. Leaves a clean scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great for when you want to save on litter and just scoop. My cats are not bothered by the strong perfume smell it puts off.
customer_reviews.author: marcus cipollone

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: As a foster mom, i have a lot of cats in and out but this makes it spoo you'd never know! Must have for multiple cat homes
customer_reviews.author: Emily  Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great for a multiple cat household
customer_reviews.text: Great clumping, a little dusty, but worth it. Works better than the Arm & Hammer we usually get. We have two tux's who 💩 and pee a lot! This does the job great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nesbihal

product_meta.title: ARM & HAMMER Cat Litter Deodorizer With Activated Baking Soda 20 oz (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: Arm & Hammer Cat Litter Deodorizer, 20 oz (4 Pack)
feature_bullets: Cat litter deodorizer with baking soda effectively destroys litter box odor and keeps litter first-day fresh longer
